title: Chandigarh Police trace BMW car that ran over Himachal CM’s kin | punjab$chandigarh | Hindustan Times
text:
Chandigarh Police trace BMW car that ran over Himachal CM’s kin punjab Updated: Feb 20, 2017 13:47 IST HT Correspondent BMW car which allegedly ran over Akash Sen was recovered by Chandigarh Police from Gobindgarh on Monday.(HT Photo) 
Chandigarh Police finally recovered the BMW which allegedly ran over Akash Sen (28) who had succumbed to his injuries at the PGIMER on February 10, a day after he was run over by the BMW car.The care was recovered from Gobindgarh on Monday. 
Sen was allegedly crushed under the luxury car by accused Balraj Singh Randhawa and Harmehtab Singh on February 9. 
While Harmehtab was arrested from Haridwar, Randhawa is still at large. tags
